Level 38 Fletching is required to make these and they will yield 6.5 experience per arrow. They can only be used with a Composite ogre bow. They have the same ranged strength as ogre arrows.

Item ID4788

Black brutal arrows are used to kill Zogres south of the Castle Wars arena. They are made with flighted ogre arrows and black nails. Level 38 Fletching is required to make these and they will yield 6.5 experience per arrow. They can only be used with a Composite ogre bow. They have the same ranged strength as ogre arrows.

[[File:Black brutal detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Black brutal arrows''' are used to kill [[Zogre]]s south of the [[Castle Wars]] arena. They are made with [[flighted ogre arrow]]s and [[black nails]]. Level 38 [[Fletching]] is required to make these and they will yield 6.5 [[experience]] per arrow. They can only be used with a [[Composite ogre bow]]. They have the same ranged strength as [[ogre arrow]]s.
